column4: U.S. Supreme Court agrees to hear Microsoft appeal in Xbox case
column5: WASHINGTON The U.S. Supreme Court on Friday agreed to consider Microsoft Corp's bid to fend off class action claims by Xbox 360 owners who contend that the videogame console has a design defect that causes game discs to be gouged.
